allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add automated Vercel deployment workflow

- Add deploy.sh script for automated git push and Vercel deployment
- Add npm scripts for triggering Vercel deployments via webhook
- Configure git hooks for deployment automation
- Enable seamless CI/CD workflow with Vercel deploy hooks

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(YOU" in English for both
locales to maintain brand consistency and international appeal.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(YOU"
- Investment: Fix package order \(Wedding #2, Brand #3\)
- Investment: Correct prices \(Wedding 1995, Brand 595, Lifestyle 375\)
- Investment: Update package subtitles to English versions
- Investment: Portrait and Event remain "On request"

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
